name: vImage_AffineTransform_Double
desc: A structure for values that represent a double-precision affine transformation.

items.name: init(a: Double, b: Double, c: Double, d: Double, tx: Double, ty: Double)
var a: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [1,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var b: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [1,2] in the matrix.

items.name: var c: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [2,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var d: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [2,2] in the matrix.

items.name: var tx: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [3,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var ty: Double
items.desc: The entry at position [3,2] in the matrix.
